data:
[et_pb_section fb_built="1" _builder_version="4.27.0" background_color="#ffffff" custom_padding="100px||100px||true|false" global_colors_info="{}"] [et_pb_row _builder_version="4.27.0" max_width="1200px" custom_padding="0px||64px||false|false" global_colors_info="{}"] [et_pb_column type="4_4" _builder_version="4.27.0" global_colors_info="{}"] [et_pb_text _builder_version="4.27.0" text_font="JetBrains Mono|500|||||||" text_text_color="#3798E4" text_font_size="11px" text_letter_spacing="3px" text_orientation="center" header_2_font="Lexend|700|||||||" header_2_text_color="#253B50" header_2_font_size="44px" header_2_line_height="1.15em" global_colors_info="{}"]

Why Trust DigiWin

Credibility Without Hype

[/et_pb_text] [et_pb_text _builder_version="4.27.0" text_font="Source Sans 3||||||||" text_text_color="#64748b" text_font_size="18px" text_line_height="1.6em" text_orientation="center" max_width="600px" module_alignment="center" global_colors_info="{}"]

We don’t just claim to be different. Here’s the evidence.

[/et_pb_text] [/et_pb_column] [/et_pb_row] [et_pb_row column_structure="1_2,1_2" _builder_version="4.27.0" max_width="1200px" custom_padding="0px||24px||false|false" global_colors_info="{}"] [et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.27.0" background_color="#253B50" custom_padding="36px|36px|36px|36px|true|true" border_radii="on|20px|20px|20px|20px" global_colors_info="{}"] [et_pb_text _builder_version="4.27.0" text_font="JetBrains Mono|600|||||||" text_text_color="#3798E4" text_font_size="12px" text_letter_spacing="1px" custom_margin="||8px||false|false" global_colors_info="{}"]

300378

[/et_pb_text] [et_pb_text _builder_version="4.27.0" header_3_font="Lexend|700|||||||" header_3_text_color="#ffffff" header_3_font_size="22px" custom_margin="||12px||false|false" global_colors_info="{}"]

Financial Stability

[/et_pb_text] [et_pb_text _builder_version="4.27.0" text_font="Source Sans 3||||||||" text_text_color="rgba(255,255,255,0.85)" text_font_size="16px" text_line_height="1.7em" custom_margin="||16px||false|false" global_colors_info="{}"]

We are a publicly traded company with transparent financials—the stability partners and clients need for a 10-year relationship.

[/et_pb_text] [et_pb_text _builder_version="4.27.0" text_font="Source Sans 3||||||||" text_text_color="rgba(255,255,255,0.6)" text_font_size="14px" text_line_height="1.6em" global_colors_info="{}"]

Unlike “fly-by-night” software houses or small local vendors who might go bankrupt, DigiWin is a Shenzhen-listed company with regulated governance. Proves vendor is a permanent entity with capital to support partners long-term.

[/et_pb_text] [/et_pb_column] [et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.27.0" background_color="#253B50" custom_padding="36px|36px|36px|36px|true|true" border_radii="on|20px|20px|20px|20px" global_colors_info="{}"] [et_pb_text _builder_version="4.27.0" text_font="JetBrains Mono|600|||||||" text_text_color="#3798E4" text_font_size="12px" text_letter_spacing="1px" custom_margin="||8px||false|false" global_colors_info="{}"]

Foxconn FII

[/et_pb_text] [et_pb_text _builder_version="4.27.0" header_3_font="Lexend|700|||||||" header_3_text_color="#ffffff" header_3_font_size="22px" custom_margin="||12px||false|false" global_colors_info="{}"]

Manufacturing DNA

[/et_pb_text] [et_pb_text _builder_version="4.27.0" text_font="Source Sans 3||||||||" text_text_color="rgba(255,255,255,0.85)" text_font_size="16px" text_line_height="1.7em" custom_margin="||16px||false|false" global_colors_info="{}"]

Strategic investment from Foxconn Industrial Internet validates our software handles the world’s largest electronics manufacturer.

[/et_pb_text] [et_pb_text _builder_version="4.27.0" text_font="Source Sans 3||||||||" text_text_color="rgba(255,255,255,0.6)" text_font_size="14px" text_line_height="1.6em" global_colors_info="{}"]

This isn’t just “IT software”—it’s Industrial Reality. When the company that builds iPhones trusts DigiWin, it proves “Smart Factory” capabilities at the highest level of complexity.

[/et_pb_text] [/et_pb_column] [/et_pb_row] [et_pb_row column_structure="1_2,1_2" _builder_version="4.27.0" max_width="1200px" custom_padding="0px||24px||false|false" global_colors_info="{}"] [et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.27.0" background_color="#253B50" custom_padding="36px|36px|36px|36px|true|true" border_radii="on|20px|20px|20px|20px" global_colors_info="{}"] [et_pb_text _builder_version="4.27.0" text_font="JetBrains Mono|600|||||||" text_text_color="#3798E4" text_font_size="12px" text_letter_spacing="1px" custom_margin="||8px||false|false" global_colors_info="{}"]

Since 1982

[/et_pb_text] [et_pb_text _builder_version="4.27.0" header_3_font="Lexend|700|||||||" header_3_text_color="#ffffff" header_3_font_size="22px" custom_margin="||12px||false|false" global_colors_info="{}"]

Domain Endurance

[/et_pb_text] [et_pb_text _builder_version="4.27.0" text_font="Source Sans 3||||||||" text_text_color="rgba(255,255,255,0.85)" text_font_size="16px" text_line_height="1.7em" custom_margin="||16px||false|false" global_colors_info="{}"]

We have spent 44 years exclusively in manufacturing software—built on decades of shop-floor reality, not temporary tech trends.

[/et_pb_text] [et_pb_text _builder_version="4.27.0" text_font="Source Sans 3||||||||" text_text_color="rgba(255,255,255,0.6)" text_font_size="14px" text_line_height="1.6em" global_colors_info="{}"]

DigiWin has survived every technology shift (DOS → Windows → Cloud) while staying focused on manufacturing. We didn’t pivot to crypto or retail POS when it was trendy.

[/et_pb_text] [/et_pb_column] [et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.27.0" background_color="#253B50" custom_padding="36px|36px|36px|36px|true|true" border_radii="on|20px|20px|20px|20px" global_colors_info="{}"] [et_pb_text _builder_version="4.27.0" text_font="JetBrains Mono|600|||||||" text_text_color="#3798E4" text_font_size="12px" text_letter_spacing="1px" custom_margin="||8px||false|false" global_colors_info="{}"]

50,000+

[/et_pb_text] [et_pb_text _builder_version="4.27.0" header_3_font="Lexend|700|||||||" header_3_text_color="#ffffff" header_3_font_size="22px" custom_margin="||12px||false|false" global_colors_info="{}"]

Scale Proof

[/et_pb_text] [et_pb_text _builder_version="4.27.0" text_font="Source Sans 3||||||||" text_text_color="rgba(255,255,255,0.85)" text_font_size="16px" text_line_height="1.7em" custom_margin="||16px||false|false" global_colors_info="{}"]

Our methodology is refined from 50,000+ implementations across Asia—adopt a proven standard, not a beta product.

[/et_pb_text] [et_pb_text _builder_version="4.27.0" text_font="Source Sans 3||||||||" text_text_color="rgba(255,255,255,0.6)" text_font_size="14px" text_line_height="1.6em" global_colors_info="{}"]

The software logic has been battle-tested in thousands of Asian factories. It handles specific complexities (Thai tax, sub-contracting, circular BOMs) that break smaller systems.

[/et_pb_text] [/et_pb_column] [/et_pb_row] [et_pb_row _builder_version="4.27.0" max_width="1200px" custom_padding="0px||0px||false|false" global_colors_info="{}"] [et_pb_column type="4_4" _builder_version="4.27.0" background_color="#253B50" custom_padding="36px|36px|36px|36px|true|true" border_radii="on|20px|20px|20px|20px" global_colors_info="{}"] [et_pb_text _builder_version="4.27.0" text_font="JetBrains Mono|600|||||||" text_text_color="#3798E4" text_font_size="12px" text_letter_spacing="1px" custom_margin="||8px||false|false" global_colors_info="{}"]

BOI Ready

[/et_pb_text] [et_pb_text _builder_version="4.27.0" header_3_font="Lexend|700|||||||" header_3_text_color="#ffffff" header_3_font_size="22px" custom_margin="||12px||false|false" global_colors_info="{}"]

BOI Compliance

[/et_pb_text] [et_pb_text _builder_version="4.27.0" text_font="Source Sans 3||||||||" text_text_color="rgba(255,255,255,0.85)" text_font_size="16px" text_line_height="1.7em" custom_margin="||16px||false|false" global_colors_info="{}"]

Production-order-level material reconciliation that passes BOI audits—the capability no competitor can match.

[/et_pb_text] [et_pb_text _builder_version="4.27.0" text_font="Source Sans 3||||||||" text_text_color="rgba(255,255,255,0.6)" text_font_size="14px" text_line_height="1.6em" global_colors_info="{}"]

One factory saved 10M+ THB/year in supplementary taxes. Our system tracks actual material consumption per production order, not theoretical BOM calculations. Read the full story →

[/et_pb_text] [/et_pb_column] [/et_pb_row] [/et_pb_section]

info.name: DigiWin Homepage - Section 8: Trust Cards
info.description: 5 credibility/trust cards in a 2+2+1 grid layout. Each card has a badge, title, headline, and detail text. Dark navy cards on white background. Last card (BOI Compliance) spans full width.
notes: 5 cards: Financial Stability, Manufacturing DNA, Domain Endurance, Scale Proof, BOI Compliance
Layout: Row 1 (2 cards), Row 2 (2 cards), Row 3 (1 full-width card)
SVG icons from HTML version are NOT included - use DIVI icons or add later
BOI card includes inline link to blog post
Cards use grain texture overlay in HTML version - not replicated in DIVI
